thread.title: Proposal sets locations for helicopter tours in Horry County
thread.title_full: Proposal sets locations for helicopter tours in Horry County - seattlepi.com

author: seattlepi.com
title: Proposal sets locations for helicopter tours in Horry County
text:
MYRTLE BEACH, S.C. (AP) â€” Officials in Horry County are drafting an ordinance establishing where helicopter tour companies can operate in the county.
The Sun News of Myrtle Beach reports ( http://bit.ly/1h2usWq ) that county leaders hope it will ease the ongoing controversy over the tours. The proposal would prevent the tours from taking off from near residential areas because of the noise the choppers make.
Three years ago, a helicopter tour opened across from Broadway at the Beach and nearby residents complained. They sued but earlier this year the State Court of Appeals agreed with a lower court that county zoning allowed the operation.
More recently, North Myrtle Beach rejected a request by a Florida company to start a helicopter tour in that city. Again, the tour site was near a residential area.
___
Information from: The Sun News , http://www.thesunnews.com/
